summary: I HAVE OWNED A 1999 -2000 KIA SEPHIA FOR ALMOST TWO YEARS NOW AND IT HAS CAUSED ME NOTHING BUT TROUBLE, AT THE MOMENT I HAVE HAD A KIA DEALERSHIP FIX THE FUEL CENSORS THREE TIMES AND THIS TIME WE WENT TO GO GET IT CHECKED CAUSE THE CHECK ENGINES LIGHT CAME ON AND ALL THEY DID WAS TURN THE LIGHT OFF AND SAY THEY WOULD LOOK AT IT NEW AGAIN WHEN WE WENT BACK THEY SAID THEY COULDN'T FIND ANYTHING WRONG WITH IT , ALL I KNOW IS THAT ONE DAY ME OR SOMEONE ELSE DRIVING ME CAR IS GOING TO BE IN THE MIDDLE OF THE ROAD WITH A VERY DEAD CAR EITHER HURT OR HAVE THE POTENTIAL TO BE HURT .   *NLM
